misatay.taskBackend.description: Task backend to use. 'beads' requires Beads CLI installed. 'inMemory' works without any dependencies but tasks are lost when VS Code restarts.

languageModelTools.name: misatay_createTask
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Creates a new task with a title, description, and optional status. Returns the task ID.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Create a task in the task backend

status.description: Initial status of the task (default: ready)

languageModelTools.name: misatay_updateTask
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Updates fields of an existing task by ID. Can update title, description, or status.

languageModelTools.name: misatay_listTasks
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Lists all tasks, optionally filtered by status. Returns array of tasks.
languageModelTools.userDescription: List tasks from the task backend

languageModelTools.name: misatay_addDependency
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Records that childId task depends on parentId task. Child cannot start until parent is committed.

childId.description: The task that has the dependency

parentId.description: The task that must be completed first

languageModelTools.name: misatay_openFile
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Opens a file in the editor, optionally at a specific line number. Use for code review to show files.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Open a file in the editor

filePath.description: Path to the file (absolute or workspace-relative)

line.description: Optional line number to navigate to (1-based)

languageModelTools.name: misatay_highlightLines
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Highlights a range of lines in the active editor by selecting them. Use during code review to draw attention to specific code.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Highlight lines in the active editor

languageModelTools.name: misatay_navigateToLine
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Scrolls the active editor to center a specific line in the viewport without reopening the file.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Navigate to a line in the active editor

languageModelTools.name: misatay_backendInfo
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns metadata about the active task backend, including its name and whether it persists to files. Call this before commit steps to decide whether to stage task state files.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get info about the active task backend

languageModelTools.name: misatay_clearHighlights
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Clears any line highlights previously applied by highlightLines. Call this after code review to remove visual decorations.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Clear line highlights in the active editor

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.test: npm run compile && mocha out/test/beadsBackend.test.js --timeout 10000 --ui tdd
